feed.title: Principles and Techniques of Data Science
feed.subtitle: This is the textbook for Data 100, the Principles and Techniques of Data Science course at UC Berkeley. Data 100 is the upper-division, semester-long data science course that follows Data 8, the Foundations of Data Science. The readerâ€™s assumed background is detailed in the About This Book page. The contents of this book are licensed for free consumption under the following license: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0)

author.name: Sam Lau, Joey Gonzalez, and Deborah Nolan
